title: Weakening Stinger
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||[[Auxiliary]] tail-slap attack.||You have a small tail. |- |2||Improved [[auxiliary]] tail-slap attack.||You have a tail ending in a sharp stinger. |- |3||Superior [[auxiliary]] tail-slap attack which inflicts [[Weak]]. Prohibits [[cloak]]s.||You have a sharp stinger which inflicts weakening toxins. |- | colspan="3" | '''Damage:''' 6 + rank
'''Chance''': 50% * (30 + XL)/59 per melee attack |- | colspan="3" | '''Species notes:''' Demonspawn can gain the weakening stinger as a body slot option. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Good mutation]], [[Demonspawn mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Good Mutations]] [[Category:Demonspawn Mutations]]
